content.rendered:
Directed by Rohit Shetty.

Written by Yunus Sajawal. Farhad Samji. Sajid.

Cast Ajay Devgn(Gopal). Arshad Warsi(Madhav). Tabu(Anna Mathew). Shreyas Talpade(Laxman). Tusshar Kapoor(Lucky). Kunal Kemmu(Laxman (as Kunal Khemu)). Parineeti Chopra(Khushi). Neil Nitin Mukesh(Nikhil). Prakash Raj(Vasu Reddy). Johny Lever(Pappi Bhai (as Johnny Lever)). Sanjay Mishra(Babli Bhai). Mukesh Tiwari(Vasooli Bhai). Uday Tikekar(Jamnadas). Vrajesh Hirjee(Pandu). Nana Patekar(Nana Patekar (Cameo)). Azzy Bagria(Police Officer (as Bagria Azzy)). Anil Charanjeett(Naidu (as Anil Mange)). Raaf Chaudhary(Saeed). Ishika Gagneja(Teenage Khushi).Jimmi Jaiswal. Rohit KaduDeshmukh(Nikhil’s Business Partner). Ashwini Kalsekar(Damini). Anil Kapoor((archive footage)). Shah Rukh Khan((archive footage)). Sachin Khedekar(Colonel Chauhan / Baba). Rakesh Kumar(Peter Librarian). Saud Mansuri(Young Lucky). Jackey Mishra(Gopal). Nileshpatelxyz(Ips nileshpatelxyz). Deepika Padukone((archive footage)). Umair Patel(Musical Artist). Reshma Pathan(Special appearance). Vijay Patkar(Hawaldar Gandhari). Besant Ravi(Vasu Reddy’s Henchmen). Katrina Ross(Sian). Murli Sharma(Inspector Dande). Shriswara(Daughter of spirit who wants reach her through Anna). Mandeep Singh(House boy). Skaterrboyy20(Detective). Ganesh Sonawane(Young Laxman). Sridevi((archive footage))

Language Hindi.

Producers Sadashiv Athule. George Cameron. Inderjit Chadha. Hetvi Karia. Yash Shah. Rohit Shetty. Anil Thakur.

Production Mangal Murti Films. Reliance Entertainment. Rohit Shetty Pictures.
